Statement: *Org chart*: The <role>Head of Human Resources</role> shall maintain an [Org Chart]({{ .ORG_CHART }}) showing staff position, roles, and primary managerial reports. The Org Chart is generated from the [Master Staff Log]({{ .MASTER_STAFF_LOG }}) and updated as the Master Staff Log is updated.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.2, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.2

Statement: *Policy awareness*: All staff members are required to review and acknowledge awareness of all applicable policy and standard requirements as pertains to their role as part of the staff onboarding and annually thereafter.

*Criminal background checks scope*: The Company performs a criminal background checks on candidates applying for positions in the Operations (which includes customer Support), Development, Finance, and Compliance departments, as well as any candidate applying for a position at the VP level or above.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.4, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.4

Statement: *Credit checks scope*: The Company performs credit checks on candidates applying for positions in the Finance, as <role>Department Heads</role>, and/or VP-level positions and above.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.4, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.4

Statement: *Evaluating background checks*: The results of any background check should be evaluated in the context of the position and any mitigating personal factors according to the [background check evaluation guidelines](#background-check-evaluation-guidelines).
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.4, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.4

Statement: *Documenting background checks*: The results of any background check along with a statement by the <role>Department Head</role> and <role>Security Officer</role> regarding the interpretation of the results must be retained and documented as part of the hiring process. Access to both the results and statements is limited to the <role>Head of Human Resources</role> and <role>Security Officer</role>.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.4, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.4

Statement: The [Master Staff Log]({{ .MASTER_STAFF_LOG }}) shall be audited monthly by a qualified Human Resources Agent and/or Compliance Agent.

The [Staff Handbook]({{ .staff.STAFF_HANDBOOK }}) shall be audited and updated according to best pratices annually by the <role>Head of Human Resources</role>, <role>Policy Officer</role>, <role>Compliance Officer</role>, and <role>Security Officer</role>.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.7, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.7

Statement: The Company shall engage {{ .HR_COMPLIANCE_AGENCY }} to direct the Company and provide support to comply with all applicable hiring and employment laws.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.1.e, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.1.e
